author: Helix Consulting LLC
title: Cyprus welcomes positive steps taken by Armenia, Azerbaijan - Panorama | Armenian news
text: Politics 11:15 03/05/2024 Region Cyprus welcomes positive steps taken by Armenia, Azerbaijan Cyprus welcomes the positive steps taken by Armenia and Azerbaijan to use the Alma Ata Declaration as a basis for border delimitation, the country's Foreign Ministry said. "We welcome steps that foster regional stability and security in full respect of sovereignty, territorial integrity and international law," the ministry posted on X on Thursday.
